results.definition: the capacity to understand a broad range of topics
examples: a teacher must have a breadth of knowledge of the subject
a man distinguished by the largeness and scope of his views

results.definition: large or extensive in breadth or importance or comprehensiveness
examples: the might have repercussions of unimaginable largeness
the very extensiveness of his power was a temptation to abuse it

results.definition: the property of having a relatively great size
the quality of being pretentious (behaving or speaking in such a manner as to create a false appearance of great importance or worth)
